plot: Tsubasa is a new hire in the A&R department of the major recording company Gandala Music. Tsubasa is immediately assigned to oversee the idol unit "B-PROJECT," which is made up of three idol groups: Kitakore, Thrive, and MooNs. This is Tsubasa's first job, and she gets involved in various incidents and accidents as she deals with this group of young men who each have their own differing personalities.
opening_theme: "Kodō Ambitious" (鼓動＊アンビシャス) by B-PROJECT
ending_theme: "Hoshi to Tsuki no Sentence" (星と月のセンテンス) by Kitakore
insert_song: "Arigatō no Harmony" by Shotaro Morikubo & Genki Okawa (ep 7)
"Ashita wa, Kyō Yori Yumemiyō" by Kitakore (ep 5)
"LOVE IN SECRET × SEXY NIGHT" by Kazuki Kato (ep 9)
"Run and Gun" by Toshiyuki Toyonaga, Ayaka Imamura, & Hisako Tojo (ep 11)
